author: admin
title: The superficiality of Nigerian artists, a betrayal of the Nigerian mind - Vanguard
text: The superficiality of Nigerian artists, a betrayal of the Nigerian mind - Vanguard Vanguard Popular culture in Nigeria has ironically helped to enshrine many of our societal ills by converting them into norms and values. The lyrics of many artists today celebrate the “fast money lifestyle” which is symptomatic of a fundamentally corrupt …
